rules.note: All characters consume one small item as a scenario effect

actions.value: At the end of every odd round:
If any character ends their turn within %game.action.range%2, the Spring Gun performs:

sections.name: Tell Selandre the potion was destroyed

rules.note: All characters Recover %game.card.recover% one lost card
Remove Guttermaw from the map and read %data.section:4%

ancient-artillery-scenario-32.1: Target all enemies at %game.action.range%2 or higher
ancient-artillery-scenario-32.2: where X is the number of hexes between the Artillery and the target

blood-ooze.1: in a hex adjacent to the target with H equal to the summoning %data.monster.blood-ooze%'s current hit point value minus 2 (limited by a normal %data.monster.blood-ooze%'s specific maximum hit point value)
blood-ooze.2: Hit point value equal to three instead
blood-ooze.5: Add +2 %game.action.attack% if the target is adjacent to at least two %data.monster.blood-ooze%s
blood-ooze.6: If at least one money token was looted:

brood-mother.1: She cannot be reduced below 1 hit point. When attacks, she considers any %game.attackmodifier.double% attack modifier card the enemy draws to be %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

drake-porter.1: Every time you kill a drake, the %data.monster.drake-porter% suffers %game.damage:2%.

eternal-demon.1: to a map tile occupied by the least amount of characters.
eternal-demon.2: where X is equal to the number of characters on different map tiles not occupied by the %data.monster.eternal-demon%.
eternal-demon.3: Target all enemies sharing the same map tile.

frozen-cadaver.1: Target all adjacent enemies that do not have any %game.condition.chill% tokens

ghost-viper.1: +1 %game.action.attack% on each attack targeting a figure with %game.condition.poison%
ghost-viper.extra: Even numbered Ghost Vipers act according to the first drawn ability card and odd numbered Ghost Vipers act according to the second drawn ability card.

gnashing-drake.1: Add +1 %game.action.attack% if the target's current hit point value is less than maximum.

goremyon-shatter-mind.1: Normal ally with the fewest hit points performs:
goremyon-shatter-mind.3: The character with the slowest initiative is forced to perform:
goremyon-shatter-mind.4: where X is the value on the stat card
goremyon-shatter-mind.5: as if their allies where enemies and their enemies were allies.
goremyon-shatter-mind.6: %data.monster.goremyon-shatter-mind% is immune to all forced movement, including %game.action.teleport%.

hail-demon.2: Target one enemy with no %game.condition.chill% tokens within %game.action.range:3%
hail-demon.3: Create a %game.condition.chill% trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy.

harrower-aegis.5: Target all enemies within one hex along the path moved

harrower-icecrawlers.1: If any enemy suffers %game.action.retaliate% %game.damage% from attacking an Icecrawler this round, this enemy gains %game.condition.chill%.
harrower-icecrawlers.2: All enemies adjacent to the target suffer %game.damage:1%

inox-bodyguard-scenario-32.1: Then focus on a new target and repeat these abilities until there are no new targets

land-leviathan.1: Increase the %data.monster.land-leviathan%'s maximum hit point value by 2.

morphling.1: Shield only applies before its turn.
morphling.2: All characters and character summons gain %game.condition.muddle%
morphling.3:
Move all characters to the hexes %game.mapMarker.a%
Move the Morphling to hex %game.mapMarker.b%
morphling.4: Draw 1 card from the Sputting Drake deck, the Morphling gains the traits of an elite Spitting Drake and performs the abilities on that card
morphling.5: All characters and character summons occupying a water tile suffer 1 damage
morphling.6: Draw 1 card from the Lurker deck, the Morphling gains the traits of an elite Lurker and performs the abilities on that card
morphling.7: Use Water Spirit traits and last drawn ability card
morphling.8: Use Spitting Drake traits and last drawn ability card
morphling.9: Use Lurker traits and last drawn ability card

ravenous-gharial.2: Shield only applies on ranged attacks
ravenous-gharial.5: where X is the %game.damage% dealt by the attack ability.
ravenous-gharial.6: This movement may move through all figures.
ravenous-gharial.7: where X is this figure's %game.action.attack% value.
ravenous-gharial.8: All ranged attacks targeting this figure gain Disadvantage.
ravenous-gharial.10: If this attack was performed, remove %game.condition.invisible%.

rogue-hollowpact.1: where X is equal to the number of Void Pit obstacles
rogue-hollowpact.2: Jump to an empty hex adjacent to a Void Pit obstacle furthest away from a character within %game.action.range:4%.
rogue-hollowpact.3: All enemies adjacent to a Void Pit obstacle suffer %game.damage:2%.

ruinmaw.1: Focus on the nearest enemy that does not have %game.condition.rupture%:

ruinmaw-section-2.1: First enemy that ends turn adjacent to the Ruinmaw, perform:
ruinmaw-section-2.3: At end of round, if %game.condition.invisible% perform:

ruinmaw-section-4.1: Where X is the number of Vermling Shamans alive

savvas-icebound.1:
If occupying tile A2b, jump to %game.mapMarker.e%
If occupying tile A3a, jump to %game.mapMarker.d%

terrible-two-archer.1: Create a %game.damage:3% trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy

terrorscale-drake.1: all enemies adjacent to the target suffer %game.damage:1%

toxic-imp.2: If an enemy targets %data.monster.toxic-imp% with an attack, that enemy gains %game.condition.infect%.
toxic-imp.3: If a negative condition was removed with this heal, the target gains %game.condition.strengthen%.

water-spirit.1: Shield only applies before its turn.
water-spirit.2: Add +2 %game.action.attack% if the target is occupying a water tile
water-spirit.3: where X is equal to the number of water tiles within %game.action.range:1%.
water-spirit.4: All enemies occupying a water tile suffer %game.damage:1%.
water-spirit.5: Create a water tile in all hexes occupied by a target containing no overlay tiles.
water-spirit.6: Where X is equal to the number of water tiles within %game.action.range:1%, up to 3.
water-spirit.7: Create a water tile in an unoccupied adjacent hex closest to an enemy containing no overlay tile.

your-shadow.2: %game.action.teleport% to an unoccupied hex adjacent to the enemy and perform
your-shadow.3: If no legal hex exists for the %game.action.teleport% perform instead

beetle.1: Place one Colony %data.action.custom.cs-colony% token of your choice on any empty hex within %game.action.range:2%
beetle.2: where X is the number of active Cultivate %data.action.custom.cs-cultivate% actions

bleeding-claw.2: Once each scenario, become %game.action.custom.cs-sated% after collecting your fifth loot token
bleeding-claw.3: Become %game.action.custom.cs-sated% each time you lose a card to negate suffering damage
bleeding-claw.4: Whenever one of your abilities causes at least one enemy to gain %game.condition.rupture%, immediately after that ability perform "%game.action.move:1%"

chain-helmet.4: Create a %game.damage:2% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:2%

crescent-sun.2: Target all enemies in the depicted '%game.action.areaRotated:(0,1,active)|(1,0,target)|(1,2,target)|(1,1,target)%'

galaxy.1: %game.attackmodifier.plus3% if you are at full health

leaf.2: At the start of your first turn each scenario, gain %game.condition.bless%

skull.1: %game.attackmodifier.plus2% if a Spirit %game.action.custom.cs-spirit% performed the attack

sprig.1: where X is the poison value of the target
sprig.2: Create difficult terrain in the hex occupied by the target
sprig.3: %game.attackmodifier.plus1% if the target occupy difficult terrain
sprig.4: Self, if you occupy difficult terrain
sprig.5: Gain "Poison Dagger" (Item 011). You may carry one additional %game.items.slots.onehand% item with "Dagger" in its name
sprig.6: Ignore damage, and negative conditions and modifiers from Events,

target.1: if the attack is a Projectile %data.action.custom.cs-projectile%

tusks.2: where X is the number of summoned allies you own

vortex.2: Create a Void pit in an empty hex within %game.action.range:2%

336.1: Oozes, Forest Imps or Black Imps killed

338.1: Enemies killed and money token looted

342.1: Allies became exhausted during their turn

343.1: Scenaries completed where enemy killed with negative condition

345.1: Two or more enemies killed in same turn

346.1: Difficult terrain occupied in different scenarios

349.1: Scenarios completed with one type of rest (long or short)

AA1.1: Scenarios with negating damage by loosing a card while adjacent to ally
AA1.2: Follow "The Riches of the Steelsilk" (Scenario AA1) to a conclusion

AA2.1: Scenarios completed without exhausting and 2 or less HP
AA2.2: Follow "Malign Echoes" (Scenario AA2) to a conclusion

QA1.1: Enemies killed with Power Modulator (Item QA-01)
QA1.2: Follow "Capstone Test" (Scenario QA1) to a conclusion

QA2.1: Two or more money tokens looted in single action
QA2.3: Follow "Mother Lode" (Scenario QA2) to a conclusion

RM1.2: Follow "Mind Your Manners" (Scenario RM1) to a conclusion

RM2.1: Rounds where enemy died during or after perform %game.card.lost% action
RM2.2: Follow "Ruined Colony" (Scenario RM3) to a conclusion

cs.13:
Each character gains one of the following:

"Major Stamina Potion" (Item 34)
"Major Power Potion" (Item 41)
"Major Mana Potion" (Item 48)
If there are none of these available in the shop, gain 20 gold instead
cs.16: One character gains one +1 enhancement to any Level 1 or X card
cs.18:
Gain 100 gold each.
This money must be immediately spent on enhancements.
cs.22: Each character gains +2 gold and 2 experience for each money token looted
cs.34: All characters add one %game.condition.bless% card to their attack modifier deck for the next scenario
cs.39:
Remove the top 5 cards from the City Event deck and shuffle City Event 57 into them. Place the remaining City Event cards aside until City Event 57 is resolved.
Any additional card that would be added to the City Event deck during this time is added after City Event 57 is resolved and the remaining cards are combined with the original deck.
"An Adder Divides" quest is not yet complete.
cs.49: During the next visit to Gloomhaven, donations to the Sanctuary cost 0 gold.
cs.QA2:
"Scrap Diver" quest complete

15xA gold each (Where A is the number of Ancient Scrap recovered)
Add City Event QA-03 to the deck
cs.random-orb: Each character gains one random "Orb" item (1-10)

11.1: on each tile occupied by a character.

cs.32C: Tell Selandre the potion was destroyed

spirits.hint: Automatically apply 1 damage to each Spirit at end of turn.

cs-1.1: During your Attack ability, you may place one character token on this card to add %game.condition.muddle% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-10.1: During your Attack ability, you may place one character token on this card to add %game.condition.curse% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-100.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.wild%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-101.1: On the next three sources of damage from attacks targeting you or an adjacent ally, the attacked figure gains %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack.

cs-102.1: During your turn, perform %game.action.heal% 3 %game.condition.regenerate% Affect self and one adjacent ally.

cs-104.1: (X is 1, 2, 3) During your turn, forgo your top action to perform %game.action.attack% X + 1 %game.action.range:2% %game.action.target% 4 - X.

cs-105.1: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.action.push% 1 to a single attack.

cs-106.1: Your movement may enter and end in hexes containing obstacles as if you had %game.action.fly%.

cs-107.1: Crate one trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%. If you or an ally trigger this trap, that figure gains %game.action.fly% for the round. | Any enemy that enters a hex with this trap triggers it and loses %game.action.fly% for the round.

cs-108.1: You %game.action.loot% each hex this summon enters. You control this summon's actions.

cs-11.1: During your turn, remove %game.condition.infect% from Self or adjacent ally.

cs-110.1: During your melee attack ability, add %game.condition.rupture% to one attack.

cs-111.1: After your move ability, perform %game.action.push% 1 Target one adjacent enemy. Add +1 %game.action.push% if you have move 4 or more hexes this round.

cs-112.1: During your melee attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.action.pierce% 2 to one attack targeting an enemy with %game.condition.wound% or %game.condition.rupture%.

cs-113.1: On your next three melee attacks targeting enemies with at least one negative condition, gain Advantage.

cs-115.1: The next two times you would lose a card from your hand to negate suffering damage, discard it instead and gain %game.condition.wound%.

cs-13.1: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 4 to one attack.

cs-15.1: At the end of your turn, if you moved four or more hexes during your turn, one adjacent enemy suffers one damage.

cs-16.1: During your Move abilities, you may move through enemies.

cs-17.1: During your Move ability, add +2 %game.action.move% and %game.action.jump%.

cs-18.1: During your Heal ability, add +2 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen% to each heal.

cs-19.1: You are immune to %game.condition.immobilize%. At the end of your turn, if you moved zeo hexes on your turn, perform "%game.action.move% 1"

cs-2.1: During your Move ability, you may place one character token on this card to add +1 %game.action.move%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-20.1: During your turn, Recover %game.card.recover% one lost card played this round.

cs-21.1: Gain Advantage on all attacks you perform while %game.condition.invisible%.

cs-22.1: When attacked, consider any %game.attackmodifier.plus1% modifier card the enemy draws to be a %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

cs-23.1: When attacked, the attacker gains Disadvantage on the attack and you gain %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack.

cs-24.1: When you would gain one or more negative conditions, prevent the conditions.

cs-25.1: On the next two attacks targeting you performed by adjacent enemies, gain %game.action.retaliate% 2 for the attack.

cs-26.1: When your hit point would be reduced to 0 by an attack targeting you, instead suffer no damage and gain %game.condition.invisible%.

cs-27.1: During your turn, swap positions with one enemy within %game.action.range:5%.

cs-28.1: During your turn, replace one adjacent obstacle tile with a money token.

cs-3.1: During your Move ability, you may place one character token on this card to add %game.action.jump%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-30.1: During your turn, create one %game.condition.immobilize% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.

cs-31.1: During your turn, create one %game.condition.stun% trap in an empty hex within %game.action.range:3%.

cs-32.1: During your turn, force an enemy within %game.action.range:5% to perform a "%game.action.move% 2, %game.action.jump%" ability with you controlling the ability.

cs-33.1: During your melee Attack ability, add %game.condition.muddle% and %game.action.push% 2 to all your attacks.

cs-35.1: When attacked, gain %game.action.retaliate% 1, %game.action.range:3% for the attack.

cs-36.1: During your melee Attack ability, suffer 1 damage to add %game.condition.curse% to all your attacks.

cs-37.1: When attacked by an adjacent enemy, gain %game.action.retaliate% 3 for the attack.

cs-38.1: During your melee Attack ability, do not draw an attack modifier card for one attack.

cs-4.1: During your Attack ability, you may place one character token on this card to add +1 %game.action.attack%. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-43.1: During your Heal action, add +2 %game.action.heal% to each Heal.

cs-44.1: During your ranged Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 2 to one attack.

cs-46.1: During your turn, one summoned ally you own performs %game.action.move% +0 %game.action.attack% +0 with you controlling the abilities.

cs-49.1: During your turn, perform one of the following: Recover %game.card.recover% one discarded card | %game.action.heal% 3, Self | Add +2 %game.action.attack% to your next attack this turn.

cs-5.1: When attacked by an adjacent enemy, you may place one character token on this card to gain %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-52.1: During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.wound% to all your attacks.

cs-54.1: Gain Advantage on all your melee attacks while you are occupying difficult terrain.

cs-55.1: During your Attack ability, add %game.condition.poison% 2 to one attack.

cs-58.1: During you Attack ability, add %game.condition.disarm% to one attack.

cs-59.1: During your turn, remove all positive conditions from all enemies within %game.action.range:2%. This can be used on enemies that have %game.condition.invisible%.

cs-6.1: During your Attack ability, you may place one character token on this card to add %game.condition.poison% to one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-61.1: You are immune to %game.condition.disarm%, even if this item is spent. During your turn gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round.

cs-62.1: At the end of your turn, all enemies consider all empty hexes within %game.action.range:2% of you to be difficult terrain for the round.

cs-63.1: When you are damage by an attack targeting you, suffer half (rounded down) the damage instead.

cs-64.1: When an ally targets you with a Heal ability, remove one negative condition from yourself before the Heal and gain %game.condition.strengthen%.

cs-65.1: During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.muddle% to one attack targeting an enemy adjacent to one of your allies.

cs-66.1: During your melee Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and %game.condition.immobilize% to all your attacks.

cs-67.1: During your single-target melee Attack ability, add %game.action.pierce% 2 and %game.action.pull% 1 to the attack and you may target one enemy within 2 hexes.

cs-69.1: On the next three Heal abilities targeting you, you may either first remove all negative conditions from yourself or gain %game.condition.strengthen%.

cs-7.1: During your turn, you may place one character token on this card to perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self". When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-70.1: During your turn, perform "%game.action.pull% 2, Target one ally or enemy within %game.action.range:3%."

cs-71.1: Whenever you would suffer damage from %game.condition.wound% instead perform "%game.action.heal% 1, Self"

cs-72.1: Add +1 %game.action.range% to all your ranged abilities performed while adjacent to an obstacle. Whenever you enter a hex with a trap, you may choose not to spring the trap.

cs-73.1: Whenever you use the default top action of an ability card, you may perform a "%game.action.heal% 2, %game.action.range:1%" ability instead of an "%game.action.attack% 2" ability.

cs-74.1: During your Heal ability targeting at least one ally, add +1 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen% to each Heal.

cs-75.1: When attacked this round, you and all adjacent allies consider any negative and %game.attackmodifier.null% attack modifiers drawn to be %game.attackmodifier.plus0% instead.

cs-76.1: During your Heal ability, add +3 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.wound% to each Heal.

cs-77.1: During your Heal ability, double the value of each Heal. If this Heal ability removes %game.condition.wound%, this item is spent %game.card.spent% instead of consumed.

cs-78.1: During your turn, one ally within %game.action.range:2% may perform one of the following: %game.action.attack% 2| %game.action.move% 2| %game.action.heal% 2, Self.

cs-79.1: When an adjacent ally is damage by an attack targeting them, that ally gains %game.action.shield% 2 for the attack and removes all negative conditions applied by the attack.

cs-8.1: When damaged by an attack, you may place one character token on this card to gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-80.1: When an ally within %game.action.range:5% would be damaged by an attack targeting them, they suffer no damage instead.

cs-81.1: During your Heal ability targeting at least one ally add +2 %game.action.heal% %game.condition.strengthen% and %game.condition.bless% to each Heal.

cs-82.1: During you turn one ally within %game.action.range:3% may perform one of the following: %game.action.attack% 3 | %game.action.move% 3 | %game.action.heal% 3, Self.

cs-83.1: During your turn, create two water difficult terrain tiles in hexes within %game.action.range:3% that contain no overlay tiles. %game.condition.muddle% all figures within %game.action.range:3% occupying a water tile.

cs-84.1: During your single-target ranged Attack ability, turn the attack into the following:

cs-85.1: During your single-target ranged Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% and turn the attack into the following:

cs-86.1: During your turn, you and all allies gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round.

cs-87.1: During your turn, all adjacent allies gain %game.action.shield% equal to your current Shield value from abilities for the round.

cs-88.1: During your turn, open one unlocked closed door within %game.action.range:2%.

cs-89.1: During your turn, open one unlocked closed door within %game.action.range:2%.

cs-9.1: During your Attack ability, you may place one character token on this card to gain Advantage for one attack. When there are three tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-90.1: During your Move ability, double the value of the movement.

cs-91.1: During your Move ability, add %game.action.jump% and double the value of the movement.

cs-92.1: During your turn, you may %game.element.consume.earth% to perform "%game.action.attack% 1, %game.action.range:3%, %game.condition.poison%".

cs-93.1: During your turn, perform "%game.action.attack% 1, %game.action.range:4%, %game.condition.poison%". You may %game.element.consume.earth% to ADD %game.condition.target%.

cs-94.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.ice%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-95.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.air%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-96.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.fire%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-97.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.earth%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-98.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.light%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.

cs-99.1: During your turn you may place one character token on this card to generate: %game.element.dark%. When there are two tokens on this card it is consumed %game.card.lost%.
